title: DNSSEC
description: Secure your DNS zone with DNSSEC.

status.enabledDesc: Your DNS zone is secured with DNSSEC.
status.disabledDesc: Enable DNSSEC to secure DNS responses.

enable.title: Enable DNSSEC
enable.description: DNSSEC adds a layer of security to DNS by signing responses.
enable.info: DNSSEC protects your domain against DNS spoofing attacks.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.integrityDesc: Ensures DNS responses have not been modified.
benefits.authenticationDesc: Confirms responses come from the authoritative server.
benefits.protectionDesc: Protects against DNS cache poisoning attacks.

enable.warning: Make sure your DNS servers support DNSSEC before enabling.

disable.title: Disable DNSSEC
disable.description: Disabling DNSSEC will remove the security layer from your DNS zone.
disable.confirm: Are you sure you want to disable DNSSEC?
disable.warning: Your DNS zone will no longer be protected against DNS attacks.

addDs.title: Add DS record
addDs.description: Add a DS record for external DNSSEC.
addDs.info: DS records are used to delegate DNSSEC signing to child zones.
